name: Roguelittle
description:
Small, roguelite shooter made for GDL July Jam 2021.

Used assets:

Simple Dungeon Crawler Art Pack - by o_lobster https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack

Sound Effects - by CGEffex and Michel Baradari - from OpenGameArt

Music pack - by Abstraction - http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Font Pixel Operator - by Jayvee Enaguas - https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/pixel-operator

Design, programming and gameplay - Miki, Chairish Games
